籤詩版本二:
Iwe unofanirwa kutaura pachena uye kuyeuka kusatsvaga humwe hunyanzvi mune dzimwe nzvimbo.
Iwe unofanirwa kunamatira kuhupenyu hwako hwekare, hapana chimwe chichakunakira
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekuchengetedza uye kubata nguva.
Kuchengeta zvinhu zvekare kunounza rombo rakanaka.
解曰: Rarama uye ugare. Zvinodiwa uye zvinobudirira. Usaite chimwe chinhu. Ingo chengetedza.
籤詩故事一:
◇Mambo Wen akakumbira kushopera
Mambo Wen weZhou Dynasty aiva shasha pakufembera.Mambo Zhou akamudaidza panguva iyoyo.Mambo Wen akaona kuti rwendo urwu rwakanga rwakaipa uye rwaizounza makore manomwe enhamo,saka vakaudza mwanakomana wavo mukuru, Bhoyi, kuti atonge Qi (zita. of place) maererano nemutemo uye kwete kubuda kunze.
Gare gare, Mambo Wen akaiswa muhusungwa mumba naMambo Zhou muYouli (zita renzvimbo).
Panguva iyoyo, mwanakomana mukuru waMambo Wen akaenda kunoponesa baba vake, asi akaurayiwa nokuti akanga akanganwa mirairo yababa vake.
聖意: Imba pachayo kazhinji haina kunaka, kutsvaga hupfumi uye rombo rakanaka, kutengeserana, kuroora, kuvharisa, Liujia alarm, Chi Tiansi, mapoinzi mashanu, kukuvara kwezvipfuyo zvitanhatu, vanhu vakashaikwa, mhosva yeruzhinji, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa pfuma, kurwara, zvakaipa. chirwere, Anshan guva rinofanira kuchinjwa.
